subject: Re: Propagation seems to be picking up.
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I don't know how one would put somehthing like together. I'm just a techno droid. I'm not a spiritual master, or understand the communcations that much, I'm just intrigued and hooked on this stuff cuz something talks, it seems to know me, and it's ever present. I only know if you provide a way that "they" can make voices, they will talk, any method of supplying the raw audio seems to work, and some things work better than the boxes. 

Frank-S




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "jamietreetalker" <thequilldriver@...> wrote:
>
> 
> :( You mean, I'm not an expert after only a few months of following your
> work? Dammit! (LOL, just kiddin' around.)
> 
> I think it would really be great and helpful, at least to me, if someone
> held an ITC/EVP summit where ONLY people who are interested in this
> technology could get together and participate in round-table discussions
> to share ideas, listen to each other's work (recordings, live
> demonstrations), learn from The Masters in the field (like yourself!),
> and come to some serious understandings. NO celebrity promotions, no
> ghost investigations or ghost celebrities (no offense, anyone, but it's
> not the place for it), no fund raising, no vendors, no competition for
> the spotlight, just talking and learning from each other and developing
> relationships. There's so much to learn and no one person knows it all
> or can share everything they know in a handful of postings on a Web
> site. I think  real human interaction is what helps progress
> understanding. People who are serious about learning this stuff would
> come to something like that, and they would appreciate it for what it
> is. I think you guys who create and understand this technology have a
> real responsibility to help others understand it. It's the Spiderman
> principle! "With great power comes great responsibility." (Thanks, Uncle
> Ben!)
> 
> 
> I just feel like sometimes people in this field are too afraid to share
> information because people will debunk them or try to discredit them or
> someone will "steal" their ideas (believe me, I'm no friggin' stranger
> to having my ideas stolen! They don't want ME around, but the a**wipes
> sure as hell LOVE my ideas!!). I really think that most people are more
> accepting than that, though, and that it's time that serious researchers
> who aren't in it for the fame come together and make some progress. I'd
> be happy to volunteer to help organize such a thing.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@>
> wrote:
> >
> >  Propagation even from the other side seems to be a function of solar
> > activity, years ago as the sunspots went away, so did the clarity of
> the
> > voices. Compressed=mp3 file. Here is one area of real research, people
> could
> > be comparing contact strength, instead of just declaring themselves
> top box
> > experts.
> >
> >
> > Partial list......."AM---They Call The Doctors Good
> > People-Edward-Don't DoIt----Lets Drink Some Pepsi--These Are Crazy
> > People--(26sec)Lets Garden The Earth-----compressed"  This Edward, I
> have
> > gotten since day one, as well as the Pepsi drinkers. From May 20,
> 2011.
> > F-S
> >
>
